price: Umunsi isi n’imisozi bizatigita, maze imisozi ikaba nk’ikirundo cy’umusenyi wanyanyagijwe.
arabic: يَوۡمَ تَرۡجُفُ ٱلۡأَرۡضُ وَٱلۡجِبَالُ وَكَانَتِ ٱلۡجِبَالُ كَثِيبٗا مَّهِيلًا

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: yawma tarjufu al-arḍu wal-jibālu wakānati al-jibālu kathīban mahīlan
